title: Short-Intensive Course for Enhancing English Teaching Competencies Based on xMOOC

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Provision of microlearning content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, operating a formative assessment-centered feedback system

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and comparatively explain the organizational characteristics of xMOOCs (pedagogy, content, assessment methods).
Learners can apply microlearning content design principles suitable for mobile environments to develop three types of learning materials.
Learners can practice providing learner feedback using automated formative assessment tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
